cv_kickstarter.models package¶

Submodules¶

cv_kickstarter.models.exam_result_programme module¶

The exam result programme with exam results for a given programme.

class cv_kickstarter.models.exam_result_programme.ExamResultProgramme(name, passed_ects, total_ects, exam_results)[source]¶

Bases: object

Representing exam results for a given programme (bachelor, master..).

average_grade[source]¶

Return the average grade of the student.

is_done[source]¶

Return true if all the courses are passed for the programme.

cv_kickstarter.models.user_cv module¶

UserCV for displaying the students CV on the frontend.

class cv_kickstarter.models.user_cv.UserCV(first_name, last_name, exam_result_programmes, keywords)[source]¶

Bases: object

UserCV object works as an view object to be used in the view.

course_title_sentence(keyword)[source]¶

Return a course title sentence.

If one course: 01234 Course For two courses: 01234 Course 1 and 01235 Course 2 For three courses: 01234 C1, 01235 C2 and 012346 C3

full_name[source]¶

Return the full name of the student.

highest_ranked_keywords[source]¶

Return the 50 highest ranked keywords.

cv_kickstarter.models.user_cv_builder module¶

Builds a User CV to display on the frontend.

Bases: object

Maps an exam result programme to an object ready for frontend.

mapped_exam_result()[source]¶

Return mapped exam result.

class cv_kickstarter.models.user_cv_builder.UserCVBuilder(campus_net_client, mongo_store)[source]¶

Bases: object

Builds a User CV to display on the frontend.

build()[source]¶

Return a UserCV.

grades[source]¶

user[source]¶

Return a user with information from the campus_net_client.
